channel.title: Multiple NPC's attacking at the same time: AGAIN
channel.description:
Hey reader
I currently have a little problem finding out what causes my problem. I have a few NPC's spawned by a minigame and they all load well and they do want to attack me, but once there is 1 of them attacking me, they all stop walking towards me in order to attack me. Even if I run past them, they won't do anything. I know it's probably in NPCHandler (maybe even in the void AttackPlayer method).

item.title: Multiple NPC's attacking at the same time: AGAIN

item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

You never said it multi area

Read full topic

item.source: Multiple NPC's attacking at the same time: AGAIN

item.title: Multiple NPC's attacking at the same time: AGAIN
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Update on this:
I managed to get them walking towards me even though I get attacked by any other NPC. Now they will attack me once the first one has died.

Example on this:

I have the 6 barrows brothers spawned at the same time on the start of my minigame. Dharok is closest to me and starts attacking me. The other brothers walk towards me to a place they can attack me. They will not attack me until I killed Dharok, not even if I attack them.

Read full topic
item.source: Multiple NPC's attacking at the same time: AGAIN
